channel.title: Making an effective adblocker for Opera
channel.description:
Let's get started. At this point, I assume you already have Opera installed. If not, you can get it from Google. First, you must find a file called Urlfilter.ini (Inside the Opera folder, of course) [img]http://img412.imageshack.us/img412/7194/kuvakaappaus80q.png[/img]
Copy all the stuff [u]under[/u] the [exclude] from this site: [url=http://pgl.yoyo.org/as/serverlist.php?hostformat=operafilter&showintro=0&mimetype=plaintext]http://pgl.yoyo.org/as/serverlist.php?hostformat=operafilter&showintro=0&mimetype=plaintext[/url] (Tip: Use CTRL+A to select all and cut out all the un-needed text ;))
Paste all the stuff into the urlfilter.ini, under the [exclude]. [u]Before saving, close Opera![/u] And there you go, you just got a huge adblocking list for Opera. Happy browsing!
